channel.title: 2 questions!
channel.description:
First question is: Is there a way what i can make a item be held different? like make a meat tenderizer be held like a greataxe?
Second Question is: Is there a way that you can make the chat filter stop? like i would put crap, and it will put ****, how do i change that?
Thanks, 3rd_age
